content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Rule summary 规则总结:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"-\\tStrictly prohibited to send EPAM/Client information/documents to personal email address or non-EPAM/Client email address. 严禁将 EPAM/客户信息/文件发送到个人电子邮件地址或非 EPAM/客户电子邮件地址.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"-\\tDo provide EPAM identity in the client’s email signature. 请在客户的电子邮件签名中提供 EPAM 身份.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"-\\tRemember to lock your computer screen when you are away from your workspace.  当您离开工作区时，请记住锁定您的计算机屏幕.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"-\\tReport to your PM/TL immediately if you have noticed any potential incident happened within 24 hours.  如果您在 24 小时内发现任何潜在事件发生，请立即向您的 PM/TL 报告.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
